reviews.name: Jayne Stedall
reviews.review: I am living overseas and I had to call Matt to ask for him to sort out my elderly parents computer.  Nothing was too much trouble - he went out on a Saturday afternoon and returned early Monday morning- having had to wait for Mweb to connect us again- and got it working.  I am so grateful for his time and patience - when he had three members of the family , one in UK, one in Melbourne and one in NZ all asking his advise.  I would highly recommend Matt - nothing seemed to be too difficult or troublesome for him.. Top service - thank you so much Matt

reviews.name: Nicky Plett
reviews.review: Amazing five star service. Matt saved the day! Friendly, professional, efficient and on point. Highly recommend Xorbtec in Plett! Thanks for the super service.

reviews.name: Riyaad Paruk
reviews.review: Im based in Plettenberg bay for the last 6 years - and ever since moving from jhb i found that places tend to be a bit higher but i have found that  Matt from Xorbtec prices very reasonable compared to online and big retail companies as well as the bonus of me supporting a local business thanks alot for your help and my weekly troubleshooting and advice you give me

reviews.name: Teresa Da Mata
reviews.review: Excellent! Great service and super reliable!

reviews.name: Kelly Gendall
reviews.review: Exceptional service & customer care that us always displayed & exercised by all at Xorbtec. Highly recommend this business to all, big & small businesses as well

reviews.name: Ren
reviews.review: Excellent service. Where do you get someone that still have time to sit down,listen and explain and give you exactly what you wanted.

reviews.name: Hezzie Ponelat
reviews.review: Matt and his team are computer and networking superstars. His recommendations have been really helpful.

reviews.name: Prestige Plumbing Garden Route
reviews.review: We have dealt with Matt Beale for many years and his service, attitude and prices are always very pleasing!  He is a real credit to Plett!!!  Keep up the good work, Matt

reviews.name: Brendon Morris (PlettTube)
reviews.review: Excellent service! Matt went more than the extra mile to ensure my motherboard problems were resolved. I highly recommend Xorbtec üëå

reviews.name: Kieran "Lelouch" Schoonraad
reviews.review: Matt and his crew are amazing, always offering the best that they can offer, 10/10 would recommend

reviews.name: Ben Roode
reviews.review: Matt and his team at Xorbtec are the best. I had problems with my PC shutting down randomly, so I took it in. He ran tests for a few hours and everything was fine, so I came back and collected it, and he didn't even charge me anything! I found a faulty power cable when I got back and replaced it, but the problem persisted a few days later. I brought it back to Matt and he advised that replacing the power supply would likely fix the problem, so he did that and got it back to me that same day at around 5:30pm, working overtime just so that I could get my PC back before I left for Cape Town the next day. Superb service, would definitely recommend!

reviews.name: JANET SMITH
reviews.review: Matt and James were great and sorted out all my issues.  Friendly and professional company to deal with. I bought my new laptop, backpack bag and portable phone charger from them. As I am now overseas, they set me up for online support in case I have any queries. I highly recommend Xorbtec. Thanks guys!

reviews.name: McNeil Wheatley
reviews.review: Great customer service and support and building custom made desktop PC,thank you Matt

reviews.name: Brendon Morris (PlettTube)
reviews.review: Excellent service! Matt went more than the extra mile to ensure my motherboard problems were resolved. I highly recommend Xorbtec üëå

reviews.name: Katrina Olwagen
reviews.review: Great friendly service. Well done Matt.

reviews.name: Lizette Vorster
reviews.review: very good service and friendly staff.  Highly recommended

reviews.name: Warren Bennell
reviews.review: Great service with a smile! Thanks for the help guys! Gained a customer! -Ginganinja

reviews.name: Christian Spiess
reviews.review: Awesome service and very friendly people!
